explains: conj. 除非，除非在……情况下；若非，如果不

sentences.en: Unless she loses some weight, she's had it.
sentences.cn: 除非她减掉一些体重，否则她就完蛋了。

sentences.en: That's the plan—unless anything untoward happens.
sentences.cn: 计划就这么定了—除非出现异常情况。

sentences.en: Recovery can't be sustained unless more jobs are created.
sentences.cn: 除非有更多的工作机会被创造出来，否则复苏无法保持下去。
